bike.description: All-new A1 Premium Aluminum low center of gravity SX Trail FSR frame, ORE technology DT and TT, forged HT, pierced seat tube, sealed cartridge bearings, ISCG mount, two forward shock mounts for geometry adjustment, replaceable derailleur hanger, derailleur guard, 4.2"/107mm travel
